events.eventTitle: A Personal Coffee with Pastor Rich

content.value: If you have ever taken advantage of this, then you know it is a unique opportunity for you to spend time with our Superintendent, ask questions, pray together, be discipled and encouraged. Coffee will take place in Ventura at Connect Church. To schedule your time before Pastor Rich's schedule fills up, please email Louise Lessel at llessel@socalnetwork.org

This year's Network Conference is set to be an incredible! Each year Network Conference is a wonderful time to gather together, get a little business done, be inspired and refreshed. This year is extra special as it marks the 100th Annual Conference for Southern California. You do not want to miss this time of celebration and honoring the incredible work of the Spirit over these 100 years.

Region 1's Event-of-the-Year is not to be missed. It is an incredible time to come together as Region 1 for worship, fellowship, and transformation. We hope you and your leadership teams will join us this 
year! Stay tuned because more details are on their way!
